title: Tell me about a problem you experienced at a hotel.

korean: 작년에 호텔에서 좀 불편한 경험이 있었어.
체크인했는데 방 에어컨이 고장 나 있었어.
여름이라 너무 더워서 참을 수가 없었어.
직원이 기사를 보낸다고 했는데, 한 시간이나 기다렸어.
기사가 와서 확인했는데, 바로 고칠 수 없다고 하더라고.
다행히 빈 방이 있어서 옮길 수 있었어.
짐 싸서 옮기는 게 번거로웠지만 어쩔 수 없었어.
새 방은 괜찮았는데, 처음부터 이런 문제가 없었으면 좋았을 텐데.
호텔 측에서 사과하면서 조식 무료로 제공해 줬어.
english: Last year, I had a somewhat uncomfortable experience at a hotel.
After checking in, the room's air conditioner was broken.
It was summer, so it was too hot and I couldn't stand it.
I called the front desk and explained the situation.
The staff said they would send a technician, but I waited a whole hour.
The technician came and checked, but said it couldn't be fixed right away.
Eventually I requested to move to another room.
Fortunately there was an empty room, so I could move.
Packing and moving was bothersome, but there was no choice.
The new room was okay, but it would have been nice if there hadn't been this problem from the start.
The hotel apologized and provided breakfast for free.
Still, I didn't feel very good.
